Review: I have constantly failed to sync my notes, photos, and documents
This app is amazing, so many options!
It's better to chat with friends.
Easy to search for items on eBay.
WhatsApp can always reliably and quickly send my messages
It's so great to be able to check my status on various bids, search for new items and place new bids all from my cell phone
features: check my status;search for new items;place new bids

Review: Dropbox lets me upload my files.
Like a well made rolltop desk, Evernote consistently provides storage in a convenient manner
Good app, could be a little lighter
